chapter.text: By the star when it goes down
your companion is not misguided and he was not deceived
And he does not speak from the desire
It (Quran) is not but a revelation that is revealed
The very powerful (Gabriel) taught him
being strong, he stood firmly
And he was at the higher horizon
then he came closer and he came down
until he was at a distance of two bows or closer
then he revealed to His servant what he revealed
His (the prophet’s) heart did not deny what he saw
Do you argue with him about what he sees
And he has certainly seen him in another descent
By the Lote (Sidra) tree at the utmost boundary
Next to it is garden of the residence
When that which covers covered the Lote (Sidra) tree
The eye did not turn aside and did not outreach
He has certainly seen some of the great signs of His Master
What do you think of the Lat, the Uzza
and Manat, the third one (of them)
Are the males for you and the females for Him
That is an unfair division

They are only names which you and your fathers named it, whereas God did not send down any reason for it? They only follow the guess and what the souls desires, while the guidance has certainly come to them from their Master
Or does the human being have whatever he desire
While the last (the hereafter) and the first (this world) belongs to God
And many angels are in the skies, that their mediation is of no benefit at all except after God gives permission for whom He wants and He approves
Indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter shall name the angels the feminine names
while they have no knowledge of it, they only the follow guesswork, and guesswork is of no use against the truth at all
So stay away from anyone who turns away from Our reminder and only wants this world’s life
That is their extent of the knowledge. Indeed your Master knows better anyone who lost His way and He knows better anyone who is guided

And whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth belongs to God, so that He penalizes those who did bad in what they did and to reward those who did good with the better (reward than what they did)

those who avoid the big sins and the indecencies except the small ones. Your Master is vast in the forgiveness. He knows better about you, when He produced you from the earth and when you were hidden (as embryos) in your mothers’ wombs. So do not claim yourselves pure (and innocent), as He knows better who controls himself
Did you see the one who turned away
and gave a little and was stingy
Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees
Or was he not informed of what is in scriptures of Moses
and Abraham, the one who fulfilled (his duties)
That no bearer bears burden of another
and that there is not (any reward) for the human being except what he tried for
And that his efforts will be seen
then he is rewarded with the full reward
And that the final ending is to your Master
And that He is he who makes (everyone) laugh and cry
And He is he who causes death and gives life
And that He created the two types, the male and the female
from sperm when it is ejected
And that the other creation is His responsibility
And that He is he who makes rich and makes poor (or gives property)
And that He is he who is Master of the Sirius (the brightest star at night)
And that He destroyed the earlier Aad
and Thamud, and He did not leave (anyone alive)
And (He destroyed) people of Noah before (them), indeed they were more wrongdoer and more rebellious
And He overthrew the turned over cities
and it was covered by what covers
So which of your Master's favors do you doubt
This is a warner like the previous warners
The upcoming (judgment day) is coming up
No one other than God can expose it
Are you surprised by this saying
and you laugh and you do not cry
and you are negligent
So show humbleness to God and serve Him
